alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 10 at 2:03PM CST until January 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to three inches. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Box Butte County and Southern Sioux County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM to 5 PM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday afternoon through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
